title: Mini-Ep 222: Life is Short, Cut Your Hair
itunes:title: Mini-Ep 222: Life is Short, Cut Your Hair
itunes:subtitle: Kate takes up drawing on her tablet and Doree calls into the pod from a hotel room. Then, listeners send their support and eye pillow recs for the listener who cries nearly every day, request an update on yoga toes, and ask what’s on their bucket list....
description:
Kate takes up drawing on her tablet and Doree calls into the pod from a hotel room. Then, listeners send their support and eye pillow recs for the listener who cries nearly every day, request an update on yoga toes, and ask what’s on their bucket list. 


  • To leave a voicemail or text for a future episode, reach us at 781-591-0390. You can also email the podcast at forever35podcast@gmail.com.
  • Visit forever35podcast.com for links to everything we mention on the show.
  • Follow us on Twitter (@Forever35Pod) and Instagram (@Forever35Podcast) and join the Forever35 Facebook Group (Password: Serums). 
  • Sign up for the newsletter! At forever35podcast.com/newsletter 


This episode is sponsored by:

BETTER HELP - Get 10% off your first month with the discount code FOREVER35. Go to betterhelp.com/FOREVER35 to get started today.

APOSTROPHE - Save fifteen dollars off your first visit with a board-certified dermatologist at Apostrophe.com/FOREVER 35 when you use our code FOREVER35.
